channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Most Blatant Exercise Of Judicial Activism’: Federal Judge Rips 2-1 Ruling Striking Down TX Congressional Map
item.description: Smith called the majority's ruling the "most blatant exercise of judicial activism" that he has "ever witnessed."

item.title: CDC changes website to say potential vaccine-autism link is being studied
item.description: A Centers for Disease Control and Prevention webpage that once ruled out a link between vaccines and autism has been revamped to say studies "have not...

item.title: Uncovered docs show top teachers union guiding gender transitions, bashing conservatives: 'Insane asylum'

item.title: GOP wrestles with Obamacare fix as Trump looms over subsidy fight

item.title: Why the Witkoff Plan for Peace Is Simply a Nonstarter for Ukrainians
item.description: The scheme would remove the tools that Ukraine needs to defend itself from subsequent Russian aggression.

item.title: Home Depot blames its recent sales slump on a major funk in the housing market: ‘Our customers are homeowners’
item.description: The U.S. housing market is currently experiencing historic stagnation.

item.title: Morality matters, even to Cuomo voters
item.description: In the latest elections, 2 million New Yorkers voted. But for some, the choice left a lingering sense of discomfort.

item.title: Trump Gets Cozy with the Saudis
item.description: The U.S.-Saudi relationship is in a better place, even if it would behoove Trump to curb his enthusiasm.

item.title: Senate Republicans, Dems block dueling attempts to repeal controversial Arctic Frost provision

item.title: Sen. Ernst Introduces Bill To End Blue States’ Fast-Food SNAP Abuse
item.description: Sen. Ernst introduced a bill that seeks to cut off a SNAP loophole that's allowed users to spend benefits at fast-food restaurant chains.

item.title: Trump administration threatens to withhold $75M from Pennsylvania over immigrant truck drivers

item.title: Exclusive: Former BlackRock employees raise $4.6 million for HelloTrade, a blockchain-powered trading platform
item.description: The startup aims to allow people around the world to invest in traditional U.S. assets using crypto technology

item.title: Grade Inflation Is Deflating the Workforce
item.description: If colleges keep handing out meaningless grades, more testing could provide a better measure of what students have learned.

item.title: Democrat Congresswoman Indicted For Using FEMA Funds To Bankroll Her Campaign
item.description: Voters so far have been undeterred by her alleged crimes; the House Ethics Committee began investigating her in 2023.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Social Security Administration touts major gains under Trump, says service ‘strongest in decades’
item.description: SSA sends letter to Congress detailing progress on benefits processing, online services and tax relief through Trump's One Big Beautiful Bill Act.

item.title: Christians Should Defend the Jewish People
item.description: In these times, those who claim the faith would be wise to point young men and women to the firm path of real Christianity.

item.title: Nevada lawmakers narrowly reject plan to lure movie projects to Vegas
item.description: That's a wrap on a pitch to bring more movie productions to Nevada.

item.title: Exclusive: GOP Leaders Grill Judge Boasberg For Allowing Jack Smith To Spy On The Senate
item.description: Calls to impeach Boasberg have been growing louder, with Rep. Brandon Gill, R-Texas, filing Articles of Impeachment earlier this month.

item.title: South Korean banks offer baby bonuses, flexible schedules, and years-long sabbaticals while U.S. women leave the workforce in droves
item.description: Some South Korean banks are offering “parental resignation” programs while America’s RTO shift is forcing women out of their jobs.

item.title: Now Is the Moment to Deregulate Obamacare
item.description: The window Republicans have won’t reappear anytime soon.

item.title: Trump tells Scott Bessent to fix the Fed’s high interest rates or ‘I’m going to fire your ass’
item.description: The president also disclosed for the first time that Bessent has been advocating for Powell to remain as chair until his term expires in May.
